# Glow Mixed

As the Glow, your name is colored during a lights sabotage.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Glow that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Glow
  • Impostors can have Glow
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role
  • Crewmates can have Glow
    • ON: Crewmates can become this role
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become this role
  • Neutrals can have Glow
    • ON: Neutrals can become this role
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become this role

From: TBD
